metadata.title: CVE-2017-15306 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The kvm_vm_ioctl_check_extension function in arch/powerpc/kvm/powerpc.c inthe Linux kernel before 4.13.11 allows local users to cause a denial ofservice (NULL pointer dereference and system crash) via aKVM_CHECK_EXTENSION KVM_CAP_PPC_HTM ioctl call to /dev/kvm.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15306` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-2-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-4.4.0-2-generic-lpae - 4.4.0-2.16
